strapiEvent.name: NWA Honor Fest
strapiEvent.description:
The Northwest Arkansas Honor Fest will celebrate our community's military and first responders with a week of thoughtful service projects, friendly competitions, and rockin' entertainment across Bentonville from Jul 10-16.

  • Community fun: Join various activities and entertainment for all ages, including guest speakers, opportunities for entrepreneurship & workforce development, a community service project at Memorial Park, a family-fun zone at Osage Park, art exhibitions, and live music performances like Brothers Osborne.
  • Down to business: An Entrepreneurship Event at the Ledger on Jul 12 will feature learning sessions and a keynote address by Medal of Honor Recipient Dakota Meyer from 10-3p, followed by the IdeaFame Elevator Pitch Contest, where veteran and first responder entrepreneurs can showcase ideas to businesses, industry leaders, and locals for a chance to win $1,000. 

Register for Honor Fest events and learn more HERE.
